deformablemesh.ringdetection

Class FurrowTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • deformablemesh.ringdetection.FurrowTransformer

  • public class FurrowTransformer
extends Object
    A utility class for consistently converting from a furrow x-y plane to 3-d normalized coordinates. The project is assumed that the x-y image is viewed by looking at the image.

        public double[] getPlaneCoordinates(double[] xyz)
        Using the normalized coordinates, this returns coordinates in the xy plane of the furrow.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        xy coordinates in the furrow plane.
